structure.unit: ARTICLE XCVI. TRAILS AT MONTEREY COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT DISTRICT

text.section:
Sec. 2-1404. [Grant of special powers.]
The Miami-Dade County Board of County Commissioners hereby grants to the Trails at Monterey Community Development District the special powers authorized pursuant to Section 190.012(1), Florida Statutes and Sections 190.012(2)(d) and (f), (except for powers regarding waste disposal), Florida Statutes and Section 190.012(3), Florida Statutes, and hereby finds that it is in the public interest of all citizens of Miami-Dade County to grant such special powers.
